item.title: Asian shares and US futures advance, as Tokyo's Nikkei 225 hits a record high
item.description: Asian shares and U.S. futures have advanced, with Tokyo's benchmark setting another record, after stocks closed higher on Wall Street

item.title: At least 35 people have been killed and 1,200 detained in Iran's economic protests
item.description: Activists say the death toll in violence surrounding protests in Iran has risen to at least 35
